name: amazon-receipt-english
description: Standard Amazon receipt in English with clear transaction details

email.subject: Your Amazon.com order #123-4567890-1234567
email.body:
Thank you for your Amazon order!

Order Details:
Order #: 123-4567890-1234567
Order Date: January 15, 2024

Items Ordered:
- Wireless Bluetooth Headphones - $89.99
- USB-C Cable (6ft) - $12.99

Subtotal: $102.98
Tax: $8.24
Total: $111.22

Payment Method: Visa ending in 1234

Shipping Address:
John Doe
123 Main St
Anytown, ST 12345

Thank you for shopping with Amazon!

Subject: Your Amazon.com order #123-4567890-1234567
Message-ID: <test-amazon-001@amazon.com>
Date: Mon, 15 Jan 2024 12:00:00 +0000
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8

Thank you for your Amazon order!

Items Ordered:

- USB-C Cable (6ft) - $12.99

Subtotal: $102.98
Tax: $8.24

John Doe

Anytown, ST 12345

expectedResult.explanation: Clear Amazon receipt with order number, itemized purchases, and payment method. Categorized as Shopping/Electronics based on purchased items.
